summary.span: 提供一个轻型控件，用于显示少量流内容。

span.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在其 属性中包含字符串，也可以在其 属性中包含 flow content 元素，例如 、和 。A can contain a string in its property or flow content elements, such as , , and , in its property. 被设计为轻型，专门用于将部分流内容集成到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]中。 is designed to be lightweight, and is geared specifically at integrating small portions of flow content into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 经过优化，可用于单行显示，并为显示多行内容提供良好的性能。 is optimized for single-line display, and provides good performance for displaying up to a few lines of content. 未针对需要显示多行内容的方案进行优化;在这种情况下，与适当查看控件结合使用的 比 的性能更好。 is not optimized for scenarios that need to display more than a few lines of content; for such scenarios, a coupled with an appropriate viewing control is a better choice than , in terms of performance. 后， 是下一个最轻量的控件，用于显示流内容，只需使用最小 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]提供滚动内容区域。After , is the next lightest-weight control for displaying flow content, and simply provides a scrolling content area with minimal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 针对流内容的 "一次页面" 查看模式进行了优化。 is optimized around "page-at-a-time" viewing mode for flow content. 最后， 支持查看流内容的最丰富的功能，但会相应地设置为更粗。Finally, supports the richest set functionality for viewing flow content, but is correspondingly heavier-weight. 使用 属性在 中水平对齐文本。Horizontally aligning text within a is done with the property. 对齐页面布局中的 是通过 和 属性来完成的。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 元素。The following example shows how to use the element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimpleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblocksimplexaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： Textblock 和按钮](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "屏幕快照：TextBlock 和按钮")![Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式实现类似的结果。The following example shows how to achieve similar results programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textblocksimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textblocksimple)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对子元素上的任何 设置都将覆盖此顶级设置。Any settings on child elements override this top-level setting. 指定多个系列后，第二个和后续的字体系列作为备用系列，在主要字体系列不可用或不适用的情况下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性仅指定一个首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用，则 会以静默方式回退到 值确定的字体。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 此依赖属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中，使用情况是 `

member this.Padding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示内容区域的边界之间填充空间的宽度，以及由 显示的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of the content area, and the content displayed by a .

value.span: 一个 结构，它指定要应用的边距量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在所有方向（`Padding="10"`）中以一致的方式来描述，也可以作为四个不同的值（分别表示左、上、右和下填充）（`Padding="5,0,10,20"`）。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`Padding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的空白宽度超出了相应的内容区域尺寸（例如，左边距和右边距的宽度超过内容区域宽度），则填充的宽度将按比例缩小，使其不大于相关内容区域维度。If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding content area dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the content area width), the thickness of the padding is proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant content area dimension. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值 `"10"` 等效于 `"10,10,10,10"`的值。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序 值的字符串表示形式，这些值对应于左、上、右和下（按此顺序）的独立厚度尺寸。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 将在内容左侧填充5个像素，在内容右侧填充10个像素，在内容右侧填充15个像素，在内容的下方填充20个像素。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一填充。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`，`in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"` 。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 元素的 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockPropsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblockpropsxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是可以添加到文本的视觉对象装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅[如何：创建文本修饰](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). 默认情况下，此属性设置为 "`null`"，并且没有任何与之关联的 。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 在添加任何文本效果之前，请创建新的 并将其分配给此属性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute.
